column4: I'm in Hiren's boot CD and I need to fix my partition table and or my mbr.  does anyone know how i could go about doing this?
I'm at the menu in Hiren's boot CD, but there are tons of options and I didn't see any documentation on the website
eh, i didn't build this comp, (im on my laptop) so im not really sure what the hdd is
you could use hdparm or check /var/log/message for that
